args:
The party finally rescues Alfonse, but the end
of the world edges ever closer. As they rush to
complete the gate they hope will save them,
they are attacked by Th√≥rr's imposing army,
and a battle for the fate of the world begins.
We came as quickly as we could,\nYour Highness. Is everyone well?
A tad too close for comfort, but yes,\nwe're good. How is everyone else?
Fine for the moment, but things are\nseriously fallin' apart out there!
Rifts are opening at a rapid pace,\nand both fiends and black mana\ncontinue to pour forth.
All is happening as it did before,\nand the world slips closer to oblivion.
No. We're ready for this, and we're going\nto put a stop to it here and now. Cleo,\nI want you to head to the Halidom and‚Äî
No. We should build the gate here.
Alchemical research was being conducted\nhere, so it's a suitable location‚Äîand \nbesides, we've little time to spare.
Wait, THAT is your plan?!\nYou seek to build a gate?!

Correct. With a gate, it should be possible
to prevent the tears in space that form
due to this world's oversensitivity to
your power.

Interesting... Well, I do not know how
much assistance I can provide, but as I
bear responsibility for what has befallen
this world, I will do all that I can.
In that case, we hold here until\nthe gate is completed.
Look at the size of that army...\nTh√≥rr's entire host is headed this way!
And we still gotta deal with Dyrenell's\nforces on top of it!
Hey, look over there! That's...me?\nWait, but how?!
I believe those are what's known as\nÔºÇForma.ÔºÇ They are simulacrums that\nhave adopted the appearance of Heroes.
We'll be fighting foes who share our faces.\nI can't say I enjoy the prospect, but if they\nstand against us, we can't hold back.
Greetings to all, be you from this world\nor another.
Soon my forces‚Äîas well as those granted\nto me by the demon's empire‚Äîwill grind\nyour last refuge into dust.
Your world will be awash with aberrant\nbeasts and dark power. It is now too late\nto deviate from your destined ruin.
You're wrong! For the sake of this world\nand the future I come from, we WILL\nchange our fate!

Yes, resist. Fight. For only in resistance
does hope exist. This is your one chance:
Your souls must yearn for battle with an
intensity even a god cannot match.
You ask our souls to yearn for battle,\nbut all we really want is happiness\nand to live in peace.
You are nothing but a nightmare,\nand we will ensure that everyone\nawakens from you now!
I know strength, and it...scares me.\nBecause strength causes loneliness.
I don't want to be alone, and that's why\nI'm not going to listen to a word you say!
Regardless, the only choice left to you\nis to fight. Show me your true strength!\nReverse your inevitable fates!
If you are able to do so, a new path\nmay be provided for you.
We don't need ANYTHING from you!\nIf there's a way out of this, my friends\nand I will forge it for ourselves!
Come on, everyone. Let's take her out\nand save our world!
